350800 |iso_code = CN-FJ-08 |blank6_name = Local dialect |blank6_info = Longyan Min and Hakka Chinese |website = |footnotes = }} Longyan () is a prefecture-level city in southwestern Fujian Province, China. In 2020, 2,723,637 people lived there. == References == Category:Cities in China Category:Fujian
